divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a concert on Louisville's watefront. (1,000's in attendance)(Kentucky-side, facing Idiana on Ohio river) It was sundown and music was definitely in full swing. I guess because it was fourth of July many people were looking up at helicopters or planes flying into SDF airport. I forget which one of us noticed it, but my boyfriend and I saw what seemed to be a red-orange glowing craft. Burning, moreso than glowing like a light. It was at a very high altitude but you could tell it was moving east at an incredible rate. It didn't jump around or go from point A to B in a snap as some people describe sightings. But it wasn't hovering either. You could just tell that it was way higher than a plane would be around an airport but moving across the sky as a whole super-fast. I imagine this thing was actually very huge to scale. As we were on our way to the port-o-john's, we noticed others saw the exact same thing. Then, following it with our feet and our eyes, we noticed 2 others way further east up-river. It seemed as though they were rotating around eachother and us, and then disappeared into the sunset. Like you could blink your eye and they were no more! I got super excited to see my first UFO as well as my boyfriend as we are firm believers and further more skeptical of government cover-ups. As excited as I am, i also feel betrayed as the government cannot seem to open up and that we do want to meet them!!!
Summary: Orange glow, slightly white in middle, up at great altitude, but moving extremely fast.
